name: Attack on Titan Quotes
description: A simple API providing inspirational and iconic quotes from the Attack on Titan anime series

about.overview: Attack on Titan Quotes API delivers a collection of memorable quotes from the popular anime series, ideal for fans and developers looking to integrate thematic content into applications or websites.
useCases: Enhancing fan websites with dynamic quotes
Building Discord bots for anime communities
Creating motivational apps with anime themes
Educational tools for anime culture studies

endpoints.description: Retrieve a random quote from Attack on Titan

quickStart: Make a GET request to https://aot-api.vercel.app/quote
Integrate quotes into your application or website

authentication.description: No authentication required; access endpoints directly.
